           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;

   <div class="media-blocks section--nogap">
    <!-- media block -->
    <section class="section section--nogap">
     <div class="columns media-block">
      <figure class="media-block-image">
       <img ""="" alt="" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/VPS_0395-1-scaled-e1697618479893.jpg"/>
      </figure>
      <div class="media-block-content">
       <div class="media-block-inner">
        <span class="media-block-tagline">
        </span>
        <h2 class="media-block-title">
         <a href="/news/climate-warrior">
          Introducing the climate warrior: Anote Tong's journey
         </a>
        </h2>
        <p class="media-block-excerpt">
         In September 2004, President Anote Tong of Kiribati made history at the United Nations General Assembly by highlighting the urgent need for action on climate change, sparking a global movement for climate justice and earning him the title of 'climate warrior.'
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </section>
    <!-- media block -->
    <section class="section section--nogap">
     <div class="columns media-block">
      <figure class="media-block-image">
       <img ""="" alt="" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/MBrajovic_photo.jpg"/>
      </figure>
      <div class="media-block-content">
       <div class="media-block-inner">
        <span class="media-block-tagline">
        </span>
        <h2 class="media-block-title">
         <a href="/news/40-years-of-impact-leaving-conflict-and-finding-community-with-chevening-in-the-1990s">
          Leaving conflict and finding community with Chevening in the 1990s
         </a>
        </h2>
        <p class="media-block-excerpt">
         Dr Mina Brajovic is the Head of the World Health Organisation (WHO) Country Office in Montenegro. She became a Chevening Scholar in 1999, studying Law at the University of Cambridge at a time when her country was recovering from conflict. Almost 25 years on, Mina reflects on how her aspirations for building a better world have changed over time, as well as the key learnings that have stayed with her from her Chevening year.
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </section>
   </div>
   <!-- Key Cheveners -->
   <section class="section">
    <header class="section-header container">
     <h2 class="section-header-title">
      Meet our Cheveners
     </h2>
    </header>
    <div class="cards">
     <article>

           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}

    <!-- media block -->
    <section class="section section--nogap">
     <div class="columns media-block">
      <figure class="media-block-image">

      </figure>
      <div class="media-block-content">
       <div class="media-block-inner">
        <span class="media-block-tagline">
        </span>
        <h2 class="media-block-title">
         <a href="/news/climate-warrior">
          Introducing the climate warrior: Anote Tong's journey
         </a>
        </h2>
        <p class="media-block-excerpt">
         In September 2004, President Anote Tong of Kiribati made history at the United Nations General Assembly by highlighting the urgent need for action on climate change, sparking a global movement for climate justice and earning him the title of 'climate warrior.'
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </section>
    <!-- media block -->
    <section class="section section--nogap">
     <div class="columns media-block">
      <figure class="media-block-image">
       <img ""="" alt="" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/MBrajovic_photo.jpg"/>
      </figure>
      <div class="media-block-content">
       <div class="media-block-inner">
        <span class="media-block-tagline">
        </span>
        <h2 class="media-block-title">
         <a href="/news/40-years-of-impact-leaving-conflict-and-finding-community-with-chevening-in-the-1990s">
          Leaving conflict and finding community with Chevening in the 1990s
         </a>
        </h2>
        <p class="media-block-excerpt">
         Dr Mina Brajovic is the Head of the World Health Organisation (WHO) Country Office in Montenegro. She became a Chevening Scholar in 1999, studying Law at the University of Cambridge at a time when her country was recovering from conflict. Almost 25 years on, Mina reflects on how her aspirations for building a better world have changed over time, as well as the key learnings that have stayed with her from her Chevening year.
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </section>
   </div>
   <!-- Key Cheveners -->
   <section class="section">
    <header class="section-header container">
     <h2 class="section-header-title">
      Meet our Cheveners
     </h2>
    </header>
    <div class="cards">

           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;

                    var menuOpen = menu.checked;

                    if(menuOpen) {

           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}
           </style>

           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}
           </style>

                function cookieStartup() {
                    $('.ccc-content--no-outline').removeClass('ccc-content--no-outline');

                        $(this).attr('role', 'switch');
                        if ($(this).is(':checked')) {
                            $(this).parent().attr('aria-label', getCategoryText + ' are on');
                            $(this).attr('aria-checked', 'true');
                        } else {
                             $(this).parent().attr('aria-label', getCategoryText + ' are off');
                             $(this).attr('aria-checked', 'false');

                        $(this).parent().find('.checkbox-toggle-off').attr('aria-label',getCategoryText + ' cookies off');

                            $(this).attr('aria-checked', 'false');
                            $(this).parent().attr('aria-label', getCategoryText + ' are off');
                        }
                    });

           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}

                function cookieStartup() {
                    $('.ccc-content--no-outline').removeClass('ccc-content--no-outline');
                    $('.ccc-icon--no-outline').removeClass('ccc-icon--no-outline');

                    var getToggles = $('#ccc input[type="checkbox"]');

                    // set defaults on load
                    $(getToggles).each(function(i) {

                        var getCategoryText = $(this).parent().parent().parent().find('h3').text();

                        $(this).attr('role', 'switch');
                        if ($(this).is(':checked')) {
                            $(this).parent().attr('aria-label', getCategoryText + ' are on');
                            $(this).attr('aria-checked', 'true');
                        } else {
                             $(this).parent().attr('aria-label', getCategoryText + ' are off');
                             $(this).attr('aria-checked', 'false');
                        }

                        $(this).parent().find('.checkbox-toggle-on').attr('aria-label',getCategoryText + ' cookies on');
                        $(this).parent().find('.checkbox-toggle-off').attr('aria-label',getCategoryText + ' cookies off');
                    });

                    $('#ccc input[type="checkbox"]').on('click', function() {

                        var getCategoryText = $(this).parent().parent().parent().find('h3').text();

                        if ($(this).is(':checked')) {
                            $(this).attr('aria-checked', 'true');
                            $(this).parent().attr('aria-label', getCategoryText + ' are on');
                        } else {
                            $(this).attr('aria-checked', 'false');
                            $(this).parent().attr('aria-label', getCategoryText + ' are off');
                        }
                    });
                }

           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}

    <div class="pagehero-head">
     <div class="container">
      <div class="pagehero-head-inner">
       <h1 class="pagehero-title">
        Chevening Scholarships
       </h1>
       <p class="pagehero-summary">
        Fully-funded scholarships to undertake any master's course at any UK university. And so much more...
       </p>
      </div>

   <div class="landing-content">
    <div class="container">
     <div class="landing-content__aside">
      <div class="sidebar bbb">
       <div class="sidebar-block">
        <h2 class="sidebar-title" id="sidebar-title-nav">
         In this section
        </h2>
        <nav aria-labelledby="sidebar-title-nav" class="sidebar-nav">
         <ul class="sidebar-nav-list sidebar-ancestor-1580" id="menu-main-menu-6">
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-1709 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/scholarships/why-study-in-the-uk/">
            Why study in the UK?
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-1700 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/scholarships/who-can-apply/">
            Who can apply?
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-1702 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/scholarships/application-timeline/">
            Application timeline
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-1705 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/scholarships/find-a-course/">
            Find a course
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-custom menu-item-object-custom menu-item-11407 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="http://www.chevening.org/faqs/?chevening_audience=applicants">
            FAQs
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </nav>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="landing-content-inner content">
       <p>
        <iframe allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen" frameborder="0" height="315" loading="lazy" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/hHDTKvt4yIY?si=RSo1df-pEWCq-7zl" title="YouTube video player" width="560">
        </iframe>
       </p>
       <p>
        Chevening Scholarships enable outstanding emerging leaders from all over the world to pursue one-year master’s degrees in the UK. Whilst there is no ‘typical’ Chevening scholar, we are looking for the kind of people who have the passion, ideas, and influence to provide the solutions and leadership needed to create a better future.
       </p>
       <p>
        Because these scholarships are fully-funded (flights, accommodation, and course fees are all included), you are free to focus on achieving your professional goals and maximising the experience of a lifetime. You will live and study in the UK for a year, during which time you will develop professionally and academically, network extensively, experience UK culture, and build lasting positive relationships with the UK. On completing your studies, you will leave the UK equipped with the knowledge and networks necessary to bring your own ideas to life.
       </p>
       <p>
        This section of the website contains all of the information you need in order to successfully submit an application. We encourage you to review it fully in order to ensure that you have the best possible chance of being selected for an award.
       </p>
       <p>
        For more information about Chevening Scholarships, please subscribe to our newsletter, The Alphagram.
       </p>
       <p style="text-align: center;">
        <a class="btn button" href="http://www.chevening.org/subscribe/">
         Subscribe to our newsletter
        </a>
       </p>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>

				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}

  <main class="main clearfix" id="main">
   <div class="pagehero">
    <img alt="" class="pagehero-image" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/13566-min-scaled.jpg"/>
    <div class="pagehero-head">
     <div class="container">
      <div class="pagehero-head-inner">
       <h1 class="pagehero-title">
        Why study in the UK?
       </h1>
       <p class="pagehero-summary">
        Studying in the UK means learning at top universities, exploring new places and making friends from around the world. Discover why the UK is the perfect place for your studies!
       </p>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="landing-content">
    <div class="container">
     <div class="landing-content__aside">
      <div class="sidebar bbb">
       <div class="sidebar-block">
        <h2 class="sidebar-title" id="sidebar-title-nav">
         In this section
        </h2>
        <nav aria-labelledby="sidebar-title-nav" class="sidebar-nav">
         <ul class="sidebar-nav-list sidebar-ancestor-1580" id="menu-main-menu-6">
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page current-menu-item page_item page-item-1707 current_page_item menu-item-1709 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a aria-current="page" class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/scholarships/why-study-in-the-uk/">
            Why study in the UK?
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-1700 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/scholarships/who-can-apply/">
            Who can apply?
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-1702 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/scholarships/application-timeline/">
            Application timeline
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-1705 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/scholarships/find-a-course/">
            Find a course
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-custom menu-item-object-custom menu-item-11407 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="http://www.chevening.org/faqs/?chevening_audience=applicants">
            FAQs
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </nav>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="landing-content-inner content">
       <p data-block-id="b44fb248-d1eb-418b-985c-6f0309273fec" data-pm-slice="1 1 []">
        Imagine studying in a place where old castles stand next to modern science labs. During the day, you can study at famous universities, and at night, you can explore exciting cities.
       </p>
       <p data-block-id="f22c1a0a-7df8-4cd1-845d-27ba5962c530">
        Chevening is more than just getting a great education—it’s about living in a country full of different cultures and fun traditions. You’ll meet people from around the world, discover new things, and maybe even try an afternoon tea!
       </p>
       <p data-block-id="728a6395-a80d-4d11-ae21-be3d68fed411">
        <span data-teams="true">
         Studying in the UK with Chevening is your chance to experience a new culture, develop academically and unlock your potential.
        </span>
        It’s not just a degree—it’s an adventure!
       </p>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <section class="accordion-outer tube-map steps section no-image">
    <header class="section-header container">
     <div class="section-header-inner">
      <div class="section-header-inner-content">
       <h2 class="section-header-title">
        Discover what the UK has to offer
       </h2>
       <div class="section-header-summary">
        Experience the UK's culture and exciting student life! Check out some of the top reasons to study in the UK with Chevening.
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </header>
    <div class="container">
     <div class="accordion">
      <div class="accordion-item">
       <button aria-controls="accordion-panel-Nature" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-button accordion-trigger">
        Nature
        <span class="button-subtitle">
         Explore the UK's natural beauty
        </span>
       </button>
       <div aria-labelledby="accordion-button-Nature" class="accordion-panel" tabindex="-1">
        <div class="accordion-description content">
         <p>
          <img alt="Cartoon images of people doing activities in landscapes, such as hiking in the green hills, swimming and kayaking." class="size-medium wp-image-23410 alignleft" height="229" loading="lazy" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/2-1-e1734533896710-300x229.png" width="300"/>
         </p>
         <p>
          The British countryside offers beautiful landscapes and scenery. From mountains and sandy beaches to lakes and waterfalls, it’s the perfect place if you love an outdoor adventure!
         </p>
         <p>
          Check out the nature locations on our
          <a href="https://www.chevening.org/resource-hub/scholar-support/get-involved/chevening-bucket-list/">
           bucket list.
          </a>
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="accordion-item">
       <button aria-controls="accordion-panel-Community" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-button accordion-trigger">
        Community
        <span class="button-subtitle">
         Build connections and networks
        </span>
       </button>
       <div aria-labelledby="accordion-button-Community" class="accordion-panel" tabindex="-1">
        <div class="accordion-description content">
         <p>
          <img alt="Quote: Don't underestimate the magic of the Chevening community, you're not just here to study, you're here to grow and explore." class="size-medium wp-image-23413 alignleft" height="209" loading="lazy" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/1-1-e1734533935958-300x209.png" width="300"/>
         </p>
         <p>
          Studying in the UK through Chevening gives you the opportunity to build international friendships.
         </p>
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.chevening.org/news/a-chevening-scholars-adventure-at-the-university-of-surrey/">
           Hear from Chevening scholars
          </a>
          on how they connected with others from around the world and made lifelong connections.
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="accordion-item">
       <button aria-controls="accordion-panel-Eating-out" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-button accordion-trigger">
        Eating out
        <span class="button-subtitle">
         Eat like a local
        </span>
       </button>
       <div aria-labelledby="accordion-button-Eating-out" class="accordion-panel" tabindex="-1">
        <div class="accordion-description content">
         <p>
          <img alt="" class="size-full wp-image-23634 alignleft" height="233" loading="lazy" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Borough-Market-300x233-1.jpg" width="300"/>
         </p>
         <p>
          The UK has a diverse food scene with something for everyone. Try dishes from all UK nations, whether it’s haggis or a Sunday roast, our scholars have tasted it all.
         </p>
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.chevening.org/news/trying-new-things-a-chevening-scholars-guide-to-british-foods-and-experiences/">
           Hear about their favourites!
          </a>
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="accordion-item">
       <button aria-controls="accordion-panel-Music-&-art-" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-button accordion-trigger">
        Music & art
        <span class="button-subtitle">
         Discover the UK's creative side
        </span>
       </button>
       <div aria-labelledby="accordion-button-Music-&-art-" class="accordion-panel" tabindex="-1">
        <div class="accordion-description content">
         <p>

         </p>
         <p>
          The UK offers rich creative experiences, from historic museums and galleries to incredible street art. Experience world-famous festivals like the Edinburgh Fringe and attend free concerts.
         </p>
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.chevening.org/resource-hub/scholar-support/events/">
           Check out events for scholars!
          </a>
         </p>
         <p>
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="accordion-item">
       <button aria-controls="accordion-panel-Public-transport" aria-expanded="false" class="accordion-button accordion-trigger">

        <span class="button-subtitle">

        </span>
       </button>
       <div aria-labelledby="accordion-button-Public-transport" class="accordion-panel" tabindex="-1">
        <div class="accordion-description content">
         <p>
          <img alt="" class="size-medium wp-image-23535 alignleft" height="225" loading="lazy" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/3-3-300x225.png" width="300"/>
         </p>
         <p>
          The UK has a great network of buses and railways, giving you the opportunity to explore and embrace everything the UK has to offer.
         </p>
         <p>
          Check out how
          <a href="https://www.instagram.com/reel/DDcZT5ls09h/?igsh=dGVyYmZlbzFwMmdh">
           Shantal travelled to Scotland
          </a>
          during her Chevening scholarship.

        </span>

       <div aria-labelledby="accordion-button-History-and-Heritage" class="accordion-panel" tabindex="-1">
        <div class="accordion-description content">
         <p>
          <img alt="Different landscapes including Big Ben, a castle, ship and someone acting in a play wearing medieval clothes." class="size-medium wp-image-23555 alignleft" height="225" loading="lazy" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/4-1-300x225.png" width="300"/>
         </p>
         <p>
          Enjoy the rich history of the UK. Walk in the footsteps of famous writers like Shakespeare and explore castles that kings and queens once lived in!
         </p>
         <p>
          Check out the history locations on our
          <a href="https://www.chevening.org/resource-hub/scholar-support/get-involved/chevening-bucket-list/">

          </a>

        <div class="accordion-description content">
         <p>
          <img alt="" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-23635" height="240" loading="lazy" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/football.jpg" width="300"/>
         </p>
         <p>
          The UK is a dream for any sports lover. It has world-class facilities, a range of sports clubs and iconic events like Wimbledon.
         </p>
         <p>
          The home of rowing, cricket and golf, there’s lots of ways to get involved! Chevening scholar Grace
          <a href="https://www.chevening.org/news/ready-set-goal-how-a-chevening-scholarship-could-accelerate-your-sporting-career/">
           shares her experience
          </a>

           Improve your English skills

                function cookieStartup() {

                        $(this).attr('role', 'switch');
                        if ($(this).is(':checked')) {

                            $(this).attr('aria-checked', 'true');
                        } else {

				top: auto;

				padding: 0;

				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;

				top: 0;
				width: 100%;

				margin-top: 0;

				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}

				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}

				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;

				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}

   <div class="pagehero">
    <img alt="" class="pagehero-image" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/rete_19MAR22_0272-CR2_DxO_PRIME.jpg"/>
    <div class="pagehero-head">
     <div class="container">
      <div class="pagehero-head-inner">
       <h1 class="pagehero-title">
        Who can apply for a Chevening Scholarship?
       </h1>
       <p class="pagehero-summary">
        Chevening Scholarships allow exceptional individuals to study for a one-year master’s degree at a UK university.
       </p>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="landing-content">
    <div class="container">
     <div class="landing-content__aside">
      <div class="sidebar bbb">
       <div class="sidebar-block">
        <h2 class="sidebar-title" id="sidebar-title-nav">
         In this section
        </h2>
        <nav aria-labelledby="sidebar-title-nav" class="sidebar-nav">
         <ul class="sidebar-nav-list sidebar-ancestor-1580" id="menu-main-menu-6">
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-1709 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/scholarships/why-study-in-the-uk/">
            Why study in the UK?
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page current-menu-item page_item page-item-1698 current_page_item menu-item-1700 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a aria-current="page" class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/scholarships/who-can-apply/">
            Who can apply?
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-1702 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/scholarships/application-timeline/">
            Application timeline
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-1705 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/scholarships/find-a-course/">
            Find a course
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-custom menu-item-object-custom menu-item-11407 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="http://www.chevening.org/faqs/?chevening_audience=applicants">
            FAQs
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </nav>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="landing-content-inner content">
       <p>
        Chevening enables outstanding emerging leaders from all over the world to pursue one-year master’s degrees in the UK.
       </p>
       <p>
        There is no such thing as a ‘typical’ Chevening Scholar, but those who are successful tend to have ambition, leadership qualities, and a passion for influencing positive change in their home countries.
       </p>
       <p>
        We encourage you to apply if you meet our eligibility criteria and other requirements. Your gender, age (there is no upper age limit), sexual orientation, religion, marriage or parenthood status, caste, class, or other attributes do not matter to us. What matters is your ability to submit a thoughtful application that demonstrates you are capable of excelling on an intense master’s course in the UK, and that you have a clear vision for your future.
       </p>
       <p>
        Learn more about Chevening’s
        <a href="https://www.chevening.org/resource-hub/guidance/eligibility/">
         eligibility
        </a>
        and
        <a href="http://www.chevening.org/scholarships/who-can-apply/work-experience/">
         work experience
        </a>
        requirements to assess your own eligibility, and
        <a href="https://www.chevening.org/faqs/what-does-a-chevening-scholarship-cover/">
         find out more about what a Chevening Award covers
        </a>
        .
       </p>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>

           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}
           </style>

   <div class="pagehero pagehero--noimage">
    <div class="pagehero-head">
     <div class="container">
      <div class="pagehero-head-inner">
       <h1 class="pagehero-title">
        Application timeline
       </h1>
       <p class="pagehero-summary">
        The process of selecting Chevening Scholars takes a minimum of eight months from the application deadline to when applicants are conditionally selected for an award. Here is an overview of the application and selection process, so you always know what's going on.
       </p>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <section class="timeline">
    <div class="timeline">
     <div class="container">
      <div class="timeline-inner">
       <div class="event">
        <div class="event-inner">
         <div class="event-year">
          <h2 class="event-year-title">
           6 August 2024
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="event-content">
          <div class="event-content-image">
           <img alt="Applications open at 12:00 UTC" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/OPEN.jpeg"/>
          </div>
          <h3 class="event-content-title">
           Applications open at 12:00 UTC
          </h3>
          <div class="event-content-summary">
           <p>
            <p>
             <a href="https://www.chevening.org/resource-hub/guidance/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
              Read our application guidance
             </a>
             , and then apply via your
             <a href="http://www.chevening.org/apply">
              country/territory’s
             </a>
             page.
            </p>
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="event">
        <div class="event-inner">
         <div class="event-year">
          <h2 class="event-year-title">
           5 November 2024
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="event-content">
          <div class="event-content-image">
           <img alt="Applications close at 12:00 UTC/ GMT" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/CLOSE.jpeg"/>
          </div>
          <h3 class="event-content-title">
           Applications close at 12:00 UTC/ GMT
          </h3>
          <div class="event-content-summary">
           <p>
            <p>
             The deadline for applications is 5 November 2024 at 12:00 UTC/ GMT (midday UK time). You will not be able to access the online application system after this date.
            </p>
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="event">
        <div class="event-inner">
         <div class="event-year">
          <h2 class="event-year-title">
           From 6 November 2024
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="event-content">
          <h3 class="event-content-title">
           Applications are sifted against eligibility criteria.
          </h3>
          <div class="event-content-summary">
           <p>
            <p>
             <a href="https://www.chevening.org/resource-hub/guidance/eligibility/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
              Read about Chevening’s eligibility criteria
             </a>
             .
            </p>
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="event">
        <div class="event-inner">
         <div class="event-year">
          <h2 class="event-year-title">
           Mid-November 2024 to January 2025
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="event-content">
          <div class="event-content-image">
           <img alt="Reading committee assessments " src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/20181030_145852-1.jpg"/>
          </div>
          <h3 class="event-content-title">
           Reading committee assessments
          </h3>
          <div class="event-content-summary">
           <p>
            <p>
             Independent reading committees assess all eligible applications.
            </p>
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="event">
        <div class="event-inner">
         <div class="event-year">
          <h2 class="event-year-title">
           Mid-February 2025
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="event-content">
          <h3 class="event-content-title">
           Applicants shortlisted for interviews
          </h3>
          <div class="event-content-summary">
           <p>
            <p>
             Once applications have been reviewed, British embassies and high commissions produce a shortlist. These candidates are invited to interview. Congratulations if you make it this far! To prepare for your interview,
             <a href="https://www.chevening.org/resource-hub/guidance/interviews/">
              please read our interview guidance
             </a>
             .
            </p>
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="event">
        <div class="event-inner">
         <div class="event-year">
          <h2 class="event-year-title">
           26 February to 25 April 2025
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="event-content">
          <div class="event-content-image">
           <img alt="Interviews take place" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/Interviews-in-Cuba.jpg"/>
          </div>
          <h3 class="event-content-title">
           Interviews take place
          </h3>
          <div class="event-content-summary">
           <p>
            <p>
             Candidates from all over the world are interviewed by panels at British embassies and high commissions.
            </p>
            <p>
             Candidates invited for interview have until the end of the global interview period to upload their references to the online application system or submit them to their local Chevening team.
            </p>
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="event">
        <div class="event-inner">
         <div class="event-year">
          <h2 class="event-year-title">
           From June 2025
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="event-content">
          <div class="event-content-image">
           <img alt="Results" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/chosenforcheveningsquare.jpg"/>
          </div>
          <h3 class="event-content-title">
           Results
          </h3>
          <div class="event-content-summary">
           <p>
            <p>
             After months of preparation and trepidation, successful candidates will experience jubilation when interview results are announced from June onwards.
            </p>
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="event">
        <div class="event-inner">
         <div class="event-year">
          <h2 class="event-year-title">
           10 July 2025
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="event-content">
          <h3 class="event-content-title">
           Offer deadline
          </h3>
          <div class="event-content-summary">
           <p>
            <p>
             If you are invited to interview and your interview is successful, you will be asked to submit your unconditional offer from a UK university. The deadline to receive and submit at least one unconditional UK university offer is 17:00 BST (UK time) on 10 July 2025.
            </p>
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="event">
        <div class="event-inner">
         <div class="event-year">
          <h2 class="event-year-title">
           September/October 2025
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="event-content">
          <div class="event-content-image">
           <img alt="Studies begin in the UK" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/ea234927-094c-47b8-aee9-fb4c9dd4c6a7-large.jpeg"/>
          </div>
          <h3 class="event-content-title">
           Studies begin in the UK
          </h3>
          <div class="event-content-summary">
           <p>
            <p>
             2025/2026 Chevening Scholars commence their studies in the UK, and enter into an international network that they’ll be a part of for the rest of their lives!
            </p>
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <span class="timeline-line">
       </span>
      </div>

           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}
           </style>

      <div class="landing-content-inner content">
       <p>
        Selecting the right courses at the right universities is one of the most important aspects of your application. Use this course finder tool to search for eligible master’s degree programmes at every university across the UK*.
       </p>
       <p>
        Your Chevening application must list three courses, and they must be
        <a href="https://www.chevening.org/resource-hub/guidance/courses/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
         courses that are eligible
        </a>
        for a Chevening Scholarship.
       </p>
       <p>
        You will need to apply separately for your course via the university that runs the course. Your Chevening application does not constitute an application to your chosen courses.
       </p>

     <div class="landing-content__noaside">
      <div class="landing-content-inner content">
       <div class="noside">
        <table style="background-color: #dde7eb;">
         <tbody>
          <tr>
           <td>
            *The course information displayed in the finder is supplied by
            <a href="http://www.postgrad.com/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
             Postgrad Solutions
            </a>
            . This data is regularly updated but, due to evolving course offerings at universities, it may not always be 100% accurate at the time of search. Candidates are responsible for checking that the courses they list in their application
            <a href="https://www.chevening.org/resource-hub/guidance/courses/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
             meet the criteria for Chevening funding.
            </a>
            The Secretariat completes final checks on courses that candidates have selected following the interview period, and any courses that do not meet the criteria will be deemed ineligible. Please also check individual university websites for more information.
           </td>
          </tr>
         </tbody>
        </table>
        <p>
         Only courses that are UK-based, full-time, start in the autumn term, and lead to a taught master’s qualification are eligible for a Chevening Scholarship, therefore only courses that have been deemed eligible will appear. Read more about
         <a href="https://www.chevening.org/resource-hub/guidance/courses/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
          eligible courses here
         </a>
         .
        </p>
        <p>
         <strong>
          Our analysis of your queries shows that most ‘missing’ courses are actually already in the database, so here are some top tips for checking. Please only submit a query if you’ve followed these guidelines and are still sure that your course is missing.
         </strong>
        </p>
        <ol>
         <li>
          Check that you are searching for the name of the course, and not the name of the department or the faculty.
         </li>
         <li>
          Check you have spelled the name of the course correctly.
         </li>
         <li>
          Courses at Chevening Partner universities and advertisers appear first in alphabetic order. Please search through further pages, or refine your search if you can’t initially see what you’re looking for.
         </li>
         <li>
          Ineligible courses will not appear in the search.
         </li>
        </ol>
        <p>
         If you have followed these steps are are still unable to find a course that you believe should be eligible, please submit a missing course report.
        </p>
        <p style="text-align: left;">
         <a class="btn button" href="http://www.chevening.org/scholarships/find-a-course/missing-course-form/">
          Tell us about a missing course
         </a>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>

                function cookieStartup() {

            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}

      <article class="feed-item">

           How do I access my Chevening application if I have lost/mislaid the registration email from the online application system?
          </a>
         </h3>
        </header>
        <div class="feed-item-summary">
         <p>
          Any email you’ve received from the online application system will have a link to the application login page. If you have lost all emails from the online application system, please click on this link to access the application login page. On this page, you may be asked to reselect the country you are applying from […]
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </article>
      <article class="feed-item">
       <div class="feed-item-info">
        <header class="feed-item-header">
         <h3 class="feed-item-header-title">
          <a href="https://www.chevening.org/faqs/i-cannot-reset-my-unique-code-using-my-mobile-phone-how-can-i-recover-it/">
           I cannot reset my unique code using my mobile phone. How can I recover it?
          </a>
         </h3>
        </header>
        <div class="feed-item-summary">
         <p>
          If you are not able to recover your unique access code yourself, you will be able to a submit a request for a manual reset. This request should be made via the online application system, which will take you through how to do it. It may take a number of working days to complete your […]
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </article>
      <article class="feed-item">
       <div class="feed-item-info">
        <header class="feed-item-header">
         <h3 class="feed-item-header-title">
          <a href="https://www.chevening.org/faqs/i-cannot-access-my-unique-access-code-what-should-i-do/">
           I cannot access my unique access code and I need to log onto the system urgently to complete my application before the deadline. What should I do?
          </a>
         </h3>
        </header>
        <div class="feed-item-summary">
         <p>
          We strongly recommend that Chevening applications are prepared and submitted in good time before the deadline to avoid any last-minute difficulties. If you do have difficulties logging into your saved application during the final week of the application period and are having trouble resetting your unique access code via the self-service process, we recommend that […]
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </article>
      <article class="feed-item">
       <div class="feed-item-info">
        <header class="feed-item-header">
         <h3 class="feed-item-header-title">
          <a href="https://www.chevening.org/faqs/ive-lost-my-unique-access-code-how-can-i-recover-it/">
           I’ve lost my unique access code. How can I recover it?
          </a>
         </h3>
        </header>
        <div class="feed-item-summary">
         <p>
          If you cannot remember your unique access code, you can use the online application system to recover it using a process that works via the mobile phone number you registered with.
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </article>
      <article class="feed-item">
       <div class="feed-item-info">
        <header class="feed-item-header">
         <h3 class="feed-item-header-title">
          <a href="https://www.chevening.org/faqs/can-i-save-my-application-and-come-back-to-it-later/">
           Can I save my application and come back to it later?
          </a>
         </h3>
        </header>
        <div class="feed-item-summary">
         <p>
          Yes. You can save your application and return to it as many times as you like during the application period. Just remember to click ‘save’ on each page before logging out. You can access your application using your email address and your unique access code.
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </article>
      <article class="feed-item">
       <div class="feed-item-info">
        <header class="feed-item-header">
         <h3 class="feed-item-header-title">
          <a href="https://www.chevening.org/faqs/what-do-i-need-to-access-and-start-my-application/">
           What do I need to access and start my application?
          </a>
         </h3>
        </header>
        <div class="feed-item-summary">
         <p>
          Please refer to our guidance for everything you need to know about accessing the online application system and submitting your application.
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </article>
      <article class="feed-item">
       <div class="feed-item-info">
        <header class="feed-item-header">
         <h3 class="feed-item-header-title">
          <a href="https://www.chevening.org/faqs/i-have-not-received-an-activation-email-what-should-i-do/">

          </a>
         </h3>
        </header>
        <div class="feed-item-summary">
         <p>
          Please check your spam/junk folders for your activation email. To ensure that emails we send to you do not end up in these folders, please put our email address, which for application messaging is chevening.awards@notifications.service.gov.uk, on your ‘allow list’. If you have checked your spam/junk folders and still have can’t see an activation email, please […]
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </article>
      <article class="feed-item">
       <div class="feed-item-info">
        <header class="feed-item-header">
         <h3 class="feed-item-header-title">
          <a href="https://www.chevening.org/faqs/how-can-i-delete-a-document-i-uploaded-by-mistake/">
           How can I delete a document I uploaded by mistake?
          </a>
         </h3>
        </header>
        <div class="feed-item-summary">
         <p>
          No documents are required to be uploaded in order to submit an application for Chevening. In the subsequent stages of the process, applicants who are selected for interview will be required to upload documents. You will have the opportunity to confirm the correct documents have been uploaded prior to submitting.
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </article>
      <article class="feed-item">
       <div class="feed-item-info">
        <header class="feed-item-header">
         <h3 class="feed-item-header-title">
          <a href="https://www.chevening.org/faqs/can-i-withdraw-my-application/">
           Can I withdraw my application?
          </a>
         </h3>
        </header>
        <div class="feed-item-summary">
         <p>
          Yes. You can withdraw your application at any time. Please note that withdrawing your application will remove all your details from the system. You will have to re-enter all your information in order to submit.
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </article>
      <article class="feed-item">
       <div class="feed-item-info">
        <header class="feed-item-header">

           Can I use artificial intelligence/ChatGPT to help me write my application?
          </a>
         </h3>
        </header>
        <div class="feed-item-summary">
         <p>
          Using artificial intelligence software to generate answers to Chevening’s essay questions is strictly prohibited. Applicants must submit their own original work. You must not use someone else’s work or present content generated by AI tools like ChatGPT as your own. Doing so violates Chevening’s guidelines on plagiarism and fraud. If your application is found to […]
         </p>
        </div>

                    $('.ccc-icon--no-outline').removeClass('ccc-icon--no-outline');

                    var getToggles = $('#ccc input[type="checkbox"]');

                    // set defaults on load
                    $(getToggles).each(function(i) {

                        var getCategoryText = $(this).parent().parent().parent().find('h3').text();

                        $(this).attr('role', 'switch');
                        if ($(this).is(':checked')) {
                            $(this).parent().attr('aria-label', getCategoryText + ' are on');
                            $(this).attr('aria-checked', 'true');
                        } else {
                             $(this).parent().attr('aria-label', getCategoryText + ' are off');
                             $(this).attr('aria-checked', 'false');
                        }

                        $(this).parent().find('.checkbox-toggle-on').attr('aria-label',getCategoryText + ' cookies on');
                        $(this).parent().find('.checkbox-toggle-off').attr('aria-label',getCategoryText + ' cookies off');
                    });

                    $('#ccc input[type="checkbox"]').on('click', function() {

                        var getCategoryText = $(this).parent().parent().parent().find('h3').text();

                        if ($(this).is(':checked')) {
                            $(this).attr('aria-checked', 'true');
                            $(this).parent().attr('aria-label', getCategoryText + ' are on');
                        } else {
                            $(this).attr('aria-checked', 'false');
                            $(this).parent().attr('aria-label', getCategoryText + ' are off');
                        }
                    });
                }

                CookieControl.load( config );

                $(document).on('click', '#ccc-icon', function(){
                    // $('#ccc-button-holder').append('<p id="ccc-intro" style="font-size: 14px;">Accepting recommended settings turns all cookie options in the “personalise cookies”  section below to "ON".</p>');
                    $('#ccc-dismiss-button').css({"display": "inline-block", "margin-right": "10px", "margin-bottom": "5px"});
                    $('<p>You can adjust your settings at any time by returning to this menu. Just click the \'C\' icon at the bottom of our webpages.</p> <p style="margin-bottom: 32px">See our <a style="text-decoration: underline;" href="/cookie-policy/">cookies page</a> for more information.</p>').insertBefore('#ccc-dismiss-button');
				});
  </script>

           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}

  <main class="main clearfix" id="main">
   <div class="pagehero">
    <img alt="" class="pagehero-image" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/fellowships-banner.jpg"/>
    <div class="pagehero-head">
     <div class="container">
      <div class="pagehero-head-inner">
       <h1 class="pagehero-title">
        Chevening Fellowships
       </h1>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="landing-content">
    <div class="container">
     <div class="landing-content__aside">
      <div class="sidebar bbb">
       <div class="sidebar-block">
        <h2 class="sidebar-title" id="sidebar-title-nav">
         In this section
        </h2>
        <nav aria-labelledby="sidebar-title-nav" class="sidebar-nav">
         <ul class="sidebar-nav-list sidebar-ancestor-1688" id="menu-main-menu-6">
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-1695 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/fellowships/find-a-programme/">
            Find a programme
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-1721 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/fellowships/who-can-apply/">
            Who can apply
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-8661 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/fellowships/host-a-fellowship/">
            Host a Chevening Fellowship
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-11362 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/fellowships/meet-our-fellows/">
            Current fellows
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </nav>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="landing-content-inner content">
       <p>
        Chevening Fellowships are offered to mid-career professionals who have reached a position of influence and want to increase their knowledge, networks, and potential through tailored short courses, research, or professional placements at UK institutions.
       </p>
       <p>
        Chevening Fellowships are an important element of Britain’s public diplomacy effort and offer opportunities to mid-career leaders and influencers from across the globe. Fellows are often people of significant standing in their home countries and will usually have completed some element(s) of higher education already. Chevening Fellowships offer dynamic training, professional development, and other opportunities for individuals to spend time in the UK researching subject matters that are relevant to their professional interests as well as to the UK’s international strategic priorities.
       </p>
       <p>
        <img alt="Chevening Fellows" class="aligncenter wp-image-9491 size-large" decoding="async" height="682" loading="lazy" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/GeorgeBrown-2018-May-6986-e1564069950474-1024x682.jpg" srcset="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/GeorgeBrown-2018-May-6986-e1564069950474-1024x682.jpg 1024w, https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/GeorgeBrown-2018-May-6986-e1564069950474-300x200.jpg 300w, https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/GeorgeBrown-2018-May-6986-e1564069950474-768x512.jpg 768w, https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/GeorgeBrown-2018-May-6986-e1564069950474-60x40.jpg 60w, https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/GeorgeBrown-2018-May-6986-e1564069950474-450x300.jpg 450w, https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/GeorgeBrown-2018-May-6986-e1564069950474-390x260.jpg 390w, https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/GeorgeBrown-2018-May-6986-e1564069950474-645x430.jpg 645w, https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/GeorgeBrown-2018-May-6986-e1564069950474.jpg 2000w" width="1024"/>
       </p>
       <hr/>
       <h3>
        <strong>
         Fellowships objectives
        </strong>
       </h3>
       <p>
        These awards aim to:
       </p>
       <ul>
        <li>
         Support mid-career professionals already in positions of leadership and influence to further enhance and expand their knowledge, skills, and expertise in the UK.
        </li>
        <li>
         Offer dynamic training, professional development, or research opportunities in the UK, relevant to professional interests and the UK’s international strategic priorities.
        </li>
        <li>
         Increase the breadth and diversity of awards offered under Chevening to position Chevening as an internationally-competitive awards scheme.
        </li>
        <li>
         Support foreign policy priorities and achieve FCDO objectives by creating lasting positive relationships with future leaders, influencers, and decision-makers, which become valuable soft power networks.
        </li>
       </ul>
       <p>
        Fellowships have a different objective to our scholarship programme and aim to provide opportunities to mid-career professionals already in positions of leadership, looking to further develop in their field of expertise. Fellows are active in their field or subject and through their time in the UK on a Chevening Fellowship, which may be a short course or self-directed professional or academic research, have the opportunity to collaborate with colleagues and peers in an enriching environment. Fellows are usually unable to take a full year out of work to study a one year master’s degree, and a Chevening Fellowship provides the unique opportunity to individuals to undertake this period of study in the UK at various pre-set times throughout the year.
       </p>
       <p>
        Fellows are offered dynamic training, professional development, or opportunities to spend time in the UK researching subject matters that are relevant to their professional interests, as well as to the UK’s international strategic priorities. Fellowship alumni can maintain and continue dialogue on their fellowship subject with UK embassies and high commissions upon returning home.
       </p>
       <p>
        <center>
         <iframe allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen" frameborder="0" height="720" loading="lazy" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/3erG--Q7YZs" title="Learn more about our fellowships in this Youtube video" width="1080">
         </iframe>
        </center>
        <a href="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/Transcription-of-Chevening-Fellowships-video.docx">
         Download transcript for Chevening Fellowships video here
        </a>
        (please note, clicking here will start an automatic download of a Word Document [14 KB])
       </p>

           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}

     <h2 class="section-header-title">
