     </h2>
    </header>
    <div class="cards">
     <article>
      <div class="joinitem">
       <div class="joinitem-image">
        <img alt="Chevening Clore Leadership Fellowship" sizes="(min-width: 1280px) 608px, (min-width: 960px) 50vw, 100vw" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Chevneing-Clore-Leadership-Fellowship-760x430-1.png" srcset="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Chevneing-Clore-Leadership-Fellowship-760x430-1.png 960w, https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Chevneing-Clore-Leadership-Fellowship-760x430-1.png 560w, https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Chevneing-Clore-Leadership-Fellowship-760x430-1.png 320w"/>
       </div>
       <div class="joinitem-wrap">
        <h3 class="joinitem-title">
         <a class="card-link" href="http://www.chevening.org/fellowship/clore/%20">
          Chevening Clore Leadership Fellowship
         </a>
        </h3>
        <div class="joinitem-summary">
         <p>
          This fellowship brings together some of the most creative and dynamic cultural leaders from around the world for a life-changing adventure. It is an exceptional opportunity to undertake an individually-tailored leadership programme that has been shaping exceptional cultural leaders for over 15 years.
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </article>
     <article>
      <div class="joinitem">
       <div class="joinitem-image">
        <img alt="Chevening Energy Market Reform Fellowship" sizes="(min-width: 1280px) 608px, (min-width: 960px) 50vw, 100vw" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Gurukul-3-760x430-1.jpg" srcset="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Gurukul-3-760x430-1.jpg 960w, https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Gurukul-3-760x430-1.jpg 560w, https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Gurukul-3-760x430-1.jpg 320w"/>
       </div>
       <div class="joinitem-wrap">
        <h3 class="joinitem-title">
         <a class="card-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/fellowship/gurukul/">
          Chevening Energy Market Reform Fellowship
         </a>
        </h3>
        <div class="joinitem-summary">
         <p>
          This fellowship offers senior professionals from the energy sector the opportunity to work alongside leading academics on their chosen independent research projects. Fellows receive support from an academic supervisor as well as unrestricted access to classes, lectures, and seminars to conduct their own research.
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </article>
     <article>
      <div class="joinitem">
       <div class="joinitem-image">
        <img alt="Chevening Healthcare, Health Policy, and Health Reform Fellowship" sizes="(min-width: 1280px) 608px, (min-width: 960px) 50vw, 100vw" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/CHEVENING-HEALTHCARE-HEALTH-POLICY-AND-HEALTH-REFORM-FELLOWSHIP-760x430-1.png" srcset="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/CHEVENING-HEALTHCARE-HEALTH-POLICY-AND-HEALTH-REFORM-FELLOWSHIP-760x430-1.png 960w, https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/CHEVENING-HEALTHCARE-HEALTH-POLICY-AND-HEALTH-REFORM-FELLOWSHIP-760x430-1.png 560w, https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/CHEVENING-HEALTHCARE-HEALTH-POLICY-AND-HEALTH-REFORM-FELLOWSHIP-760x430-1.png 320w"/>
       </div>
       <div class="joinitem-wrap">
        <h3 class="joinitem-title">
         <a class="card-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/fellowship/health/">
          Chevening Healthcare, Health Policy, and Health Reform Fellowship
         </a>
        </h3>
        <div class="joinitem-summary">
         <p>
          This fellowship offers senior professionals from the health sector the opportunity to undertake an agreed research project under the supervision of an academic at the University of Oxford. Fellows will be able to access a variety of world class facilities, and will benefit from ongoing support from staff and their university faculty throughout their time in the UK.
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </article>
     <article>
      <div class="joinitem">
       <div class="joinitem-image">
        <img alt="Chevening India Cyber Security Fellowship" sizes="(min-width: 1280px) 608px, (min-width: 960px) 50vw, 100vw" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Cyber-India-fellowship-3-760x430-1.jpg" srcset="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Cyber-India-fellowship-3-760x430-1.jpg 960w, https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Cyber-India-fellowship-3-760x430-1.jpg 560w, https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Cyber-India-fellowship-3-760x430-1.jpg 320w"/>
       </div>
       <div class="joinitem-wrap">
        <h3 class="joinitem-title">
         <a class="card-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/fellowship/india-cyber-security/">
          Chevening India Cyber Security Fellowship
         </a>
        </h3>
        <div class="joinitem-summary">
         <p>
          This fellowship delivered at Cranfield University at the Defence Academy of the United Kingdom, provides fellows with an understanding of policy and legislative approaches in cyber security and its implications for national security, commercial opportunity, crime prevention, and the right to privacy.
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </article>
     <article>
      <div class="joinitem">
       <div class="joinitem-image">

       </div>
       <div class="joinitem-wrap">
        <h3 class="joinitem-title">
         <a class="card-link" href="http://www.chevening.org/fellowship/lse/">
          Chevening LSE Fellowship
         </a>
        </h3>
        <div class="joinitem-summary">
         <p>
          This multi-disciplinary fellowship enables experts from a variety of sectors within the social sciences to spend up to nine months working with a dedicated academic supervisor on a defined research project. Fellows will have the opportunity to participate in relevant university classes while on award, and will also be able to tap into the expertise of other university academics working in their field of expertise.
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </article>
     <article>
      <div class="joinitem">
       <div class="joinitem-image">

       </div>
       <div class="joinitem-wrap">
        <h3 class="joinitem-title">
         <a class="card-link" href="http://www.chevening.org/fellowship/ocis/">
          Chevening Oxford Centre for Islamic Studies (& Abdullah Gül) Fellowships (OCIS)
         </a>
        </h3>
        <div class="joinitem-summary">
         <p>
          These fellowships enable mid-career academics or professionals to undertake a period of self-directed research focusing on the culture and civilisation of Islam and contemporary Muslim societies in a global context. Fellows will benefit from meeting a multi-disciplinary group of scholars focusing on the Islamic world.
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </article>
     <article>
      <div class="joinitem">
       <div class="joinitem-image">
        <img alt="Chevening Research Science and Innovation Leadership Fellowship (CRISP)" sizes="(min-width: 1280px) 608px, (min-width: 960px) 50vw, 100vw" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/CRISP-3-760x430-1.jpg" srcset="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/CRISP-3-760x430-1.jpg 960w, https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/CRISP-3-760x430-1.jpg 560w, https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/CRISP-3-760x430-1.jpg 320w"/>
       </div>
       <div class="joinitem-wrap">
        <h3 class="joinitem-title">
         <a class="card-link" href="http://www.chevening.org/fellowship/crisp/">
          Chevening Research Science and Innovation Leadership Fellowship (CRISP)
         </a>
        </h3>
        <div class="joinitem-summary">
         <p>
          This programme enables fellows to understand the UK science field, innovation management processes, and the interactions between research, innovation, and economic development. The programme also covers wider issues including global challenges, politics, and international relations.
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </article>

       </div>
       <div class="joinitem-wrap">
        <h3 class="joinitem-title">
         <a class="card-link" href="http://www.chevening.org/fellowship/sajp/">
          Chevening South Asia Journalism Programme (SAJP)
         </a>
        </h3>
        <div class="joinitem-summary">
         <p>
          This programme explores the different ways in which the media play a part in holding democratic processes to account through eight intensive weeks of lectures, visits, and discussions that introduce fellows to key UK academics, media organisations, and political figures.
         </p>

      </div>

           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}

  <main class="main clearfix" id="main">
   <div class="pagehero">
    <img alt="" class="pagehero-image" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/who-can-apply-fellowships.jpg"/>
    <div class="pagehero-head">
     <div class="container">
      <div class="pagehero-head-inner">
       <h1 class="pagehero-title">
        Who can apply for a Chevening Fellowship?
       </h1>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="landing-content">
    <div class="container">
     <div class="landing-content__aside">
      <div class="sidebar bbb">
       <div class="sidebar-block">
        <h2 class="sidebar-title" id="sidebar-title-nav">
         In this section
        </h2>
        <nav aria-labelledby="sidebar-title-nav" class="sidebar-nav">
         <ul class="sidebar-nav-list sidebar-ancestor-1688" id="menu-main-menu-6">
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-1695 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/fellowships/find-a-programme/">
            Find a programme
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page current-menu-item page_item page-item-1719 current_page_item menu-item-1721 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a aria-current="page" class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/fellowships/who-can-apply/">
            Who can apply
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-8661 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/fellowships/host-a-fellowship/">
            Host a Chevening Fellowship
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-11362 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/fellowships/meet-our-fellows/">
            Current fellows
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </nav>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="landing-content-inner content">
       <p>
        Chevening Fellowships are aimed at mid-career professionals who have reached a position of influence and want to increase their knowledge, networks, and potential through tailored short courses, research, or professional placements at UK institutions.
       </p>
       <p>
        Fellows are often people of significant standing in their home countries and will usually have completed some element(s) of higher education already.
       </p>
       <p>
        Chevening Fellowship programmes typically have varying eligibility requirements. Information about programme-specific eligibility requirements can be found on
        <a href="http://www.chevening.org/fellowships/find-a-programme/">
         individual fellowship programme pages
        </a>
        .
       </p>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>

           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}
           </style>

  <main class="main clearfix" id="main">
   <div class="pagehero">
    <img alt="" class="pagehero-image" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/Host-a-fellowship-banner.jpg"/>
    <div class="pagehero-head">
     <div class="container">
      <div class="pagehero-head-inner">
       <h1 class="pagehero-title">
        Host a Chevening Fellowship
       </h1>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="landing-content">
    <div class="container">
     <div class="landing-content__aside">
      <div class="sidebar bbb">
       <div class="sidebar-block">
        <h2 class="sidebar-title" id="sidebar-title-nav">
         In this section
        </h2>
        <nav aria-labelledby="sidebar-title-nav" class="sidebar-nav">
         <ul class="sidebar-nav-list sidebar-ancestor-1688" id="menu-main-menu-6">
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-1695 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/fellowships/find-a-programme/">
            Find a programme
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-1721 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/fellowships/who-can-apply/">
            Who can apply
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page current-menu-item page_item page-item-4554 current_page_item menu-item-8661 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a aria-current="page" class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/fellowships/host-a-fellowship/">
            Host a Chevening Fellowship
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-11362 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/fellowships/meet-our-fellows/">
            Current fellows
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </nav>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="landing-content-inner content">
       <p>
        The programme creates a network of influencers and decision makers who have a lasting positive disposition towards the UK, its universities, and notable institutions. Fellows are mid-career leaders and influencers, with significant standing in their home countries and will usually have already completed some elements of higher education. Hosting a fellowship enables closer connections between the FCDO, Chevening’s global partners, and an extensive alumni network of over 50,000 individuals.
       </p>
       <h3>
        Hosting a Chevening Fellowship will enable you to:
       </h3>
       <ul>
        <li>
         Support your university/institution’s strategic goals by offering tailored opportunities in line with your international or academic priorities
        </li>
        <li>
         Raise your profile in key markets through Chevening’s targeted marketing campaigns across a number of opportunities
        </li>
        <li>
         Diversify and support the capacity of your institution in an international dialogue on key global issues
        </li>
        <li>
         Extend your network of contacts by joining Chevening’s network of contacts including global alumni, a growing range of host universities/institutions, and partner organisations
        </li>
        <li>
         Increase your global impact through Chevening’s worldwide reach, capitalising on our physical presence in more than 160 countries and territories as well as our digital reach; our website is visited by millions and our social media followed by hundreds of thousands of people.
        </li>
       </ul>
       <p>
        Universities and institutions hosting Chevening Fellowships have the opportunity to design bespoke short courses, research tenures, and training opportunities which showcase the institution’s strengths in academia, research, and professional training and development.
       </p>
       <p>
        If you are a representative of an organisation interested in finding out more about hosting a Chevening Fellowship, please
        <a href="mailto:fellowships@chevening.org">
         contact the Fellowships team
        </a>
        .
       </p>
       <hr/>
       <h3>
        <strong>
         Current hosts:
        </strong>
       </h3>
       <ul>
        <li>
         British Library
        </li>
        <li>
         CLORE Leadership Programme
        </li>
        <li>
         Coventry University
        </li>
        <li>
         Cranfield Defence Academy
        </li>
        <li>
         King’s College London
        </li>
        <li>
         London School of Economics
        </li>
        <li>
         University of Dundee
        </li>
        <li>
         University of Oxford
        </li>
        <li>
         University of Westminster
        </li>
       </ul>
       <hr/>
       <h3>
        Open tenders:
       </h3>
       <p>
        The Foreign, Commonwealth, and Development Office periodically invites organisations that meet certain criteria to participate in a tending exercise in order to host a new or existing fellowship programme.
       </p>
       <p>
        There are currently no open invitations to tender.
       </p>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>

           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}
           </style>

      <div class="landing-content-inner content">
       <p>
        Congratulations on being awarded a Chevening Fellowship!
       </p>
       <p>
        On this page you will find practical information to help you prepare for your Chevening Fellowship and time in the UK. You can also meet our current fellows below.
       </p>
       <p>
        By accepting a Chevening award you agree to adhere to the Chevening terms and conditions. It is therefore very important that you familiarise yourself with the
        <a href="https://www.chevening.org/terms-and-conditions-fellowships/">
         terms and conditions of your Chevening Fellowship
        </a>
        and other
        <a href="https://www.chevening.org/resource-hub/scholar-support/policies/">
         Chevening policies
        </a>
        .
       </p>
      </div>
     </div>

     <div class="container small">
      <h2 class="section-header-title cta-title">

      </h2>
      <div class="cta-summary">
       <p>
        Chevening fellows must read and agree to the terms and conditions for Chevening Fellows before taking up their award.
       </p>
      </div>
      <a aria-label="Terms and conditions – Fellowships" class="button-alt" href="https://www.chevening.org/terms-and-conditions-fellowships/" target="_self">
       Fellowships terms and conditions
      </a>
     </div>
    </div>
   </section>
   <section class="section cards-slider">
    <header class="section-header container">
     <h2 class="section-header-title">
      Meet our fellows
     </h2>
    </header>
    <div class="cards">
     <article>
      <div class="joinitem">
       <div class="joinitem-image">
        <img alt="Chevening Clore Leadership Fellowship" sizes="(min-width: 1280px) 608px, (min-width: 960px) 50vw, 100vw" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/CLORE-fellows.jpg" srcset="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/CLORE-fellows.jpg 960w, https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/CLORE-fellows.jpg 560w, https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/CLORE-fellows.jpg 320w"/>
       </div>
       <div class="joinitem-wrap">
        <h3 class="joinitem-title">
         <a class="card-link" href="http://www.chevening.org/fellowships/meet-our-fellows/chevening-clore-leadership-fellowship/">
          Chevening Clore Leadership Fellowship
         </a>
        </h3>
       </div>
      </div>
     </article>
     <article>

                function cookieStartup() {
                    $('.ccc-content--no-outline').removeClass('ccc-content--no-outline');
                    $('.ccc-icon--no-outline').removeClass('ccc-icon--no-outline');

                    var getToggles = $('#ccc input[type="checkbox"]');

                    // set defaults on load
                    $(getToggles).each(function(i) {

                        var getCategoryText = $(this).parent().parent().parent().find('h3').text();

                        $(this).attr('role', 'switch');
                        if ($(this).is(':checked')) {
                            $(this).parent().attr('aria-label', getCategoryText + ' are on');
                            $(this).attr('aria-checked', 'true');
                        } else {
                             $(this).parent().attr('aria-label', getCategoryText + ' are off');
                             $(this).attr('aria-checked', 'false');
                        }

                        $(this).parent().find('.checkbox-toggle-on').attr('aria-label',getCategoryText + ' cookies on');
                        $(this).parent().find('.checkbox-toggle-off').attr('aria-label',getCategoryText + ' cookies off');
                    });

                    $('#ccc input[type="checkbox"]').on('click', function() {

                        var getCategoryText = $(this).parent().parent().parent().find('h3').text();

                            $(this).parent().attr('aria-label', getCategoryText + ' are on');
                        } else {
                            $(this).attr('aria-checked', 'false');
                            $(this).parent().attr('aria-label', getCategoryText + ' are off');
                        }
                    });
                }

           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}

           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}
           </style>

  <main class="main clearfix" id="main">
   <div class="pagehero">
    <img alt="" class="pagehero-image" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Cover-image_cropped.jpg"/>
    <div class="pagehero-head">
     <div class="container">
      <div class="pagehero-head-inner">
       <h1 class="pagehero-title">
        Chevening's 2022-2023 Impact Report
       </h1>
       <p class="pagehero-summary">
        In this 40th anniversary year, our impact report celebrates the change that Chevening Alumni have spearheaded across continents and industries, and we extend our gratitude to all those who continue to make Chevening possible today.
       </p>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="landing-content">
    <div class="container">
     <div class="landing-content__noaside">
      <div class="landing-content-inner content">
       <div class="noside">
        <p>
         <!--StartFragment -->
        </p>
        <p>
         Since 1983, Chevening has supported future leaders from across the globe to study in the UK before returning to their countries to drive innovation and help build a more sustainable, equal, and connected world.
        </p>
        <p>
         Among our alumni community we are proud to have presidents and climate activists, healthcare professionals and women’s rights advocates, conflict resolution and development experts.
        </p>
        <p>
         This report shares the impact that some of these extraordinary Cheveners have had over the past 40 years.
        </p>
        <p style="text-align: center;">
         <a aria-label="Download Chevening's Annual Report 2022-23 PDF file (4.70MB) opens in new window" class="btn button" href="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Chevening-Impact-Report-2022-2023.pdf" rel="noopener" target="_blank">
          Download Chevening’s Annual Report 2022-23 [PDF]
         </a>
        </p>
        <p>
         <iframe height="800px" loading="lazy" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Chevening-Impact-Report-2022-2023.pdf" title="Chevening's annual report PDF" width="100%">
         </iframe>
        </p>
        <p>
         <!--EndFragment -->
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <section class="section white chevening-blue">
    <header class="section-header container">
     <h2 class="section-header-title">
      Read some of the inspiring stories in the report
     </h2>
    </header>
    <div class="cards">
     <article>
      <div class="joinitem">
       <span class="joinitem-image">
        <img ""="" alt="" class="" sizes="100vw" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/VPS_0395-1-scaled-e1697618479893-760x430.jpg" srcset="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/VPS_0395-1-scaled-e1697618479893-460x260.jpg 700w, https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/VPS_0395-1-scaled-e1697618479893-760x430.jpg 960w"/>
        <span class="visually-hidden">
         Focusing global attention on the human dimensions of climate change as President of Kiribati
        </span>
       </span>
       <div class="joinitem-wrap">
        <h3 class="joinitem-title">
         <a href="https://www.chevening.org/news/climate-warrior/" target="_blank">
          Focusing global attention on the human dimensions of climate change as President of Kiribati
         </a>
        </h3>
        <div class="joinitem-summary">
         <p>
          After becoming a Chevening Scholar in 1987, Anote Tong shares how he went on to serve three terms as President of Kiribati and became a renowned 'climate warrior'.
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </article>
     <article>

           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}
           </style>

  <main class="main clearfix" id="main">
   <div class="hero">
    <img alt="" class="hero-image" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/chevening-40-website-banner-1-e1700574091889.jpg"/>
    <div class="hero-box hero-red">
     <div class="hero-box-inner">
      <h1 class="hero-title">
       Celebrating 40 years of Chevening
      </h1>
      <p class="hero-summary">
       Since 1983, we have welcomed more than 59,000 Chevening scholars and fellows to the UK. To celebrate our 40th anniversary, we’re reflecting on the outstanding impact they’ve had.
      </p>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <!-- Embed component -->
   <section class="section white">
    <div class="container">
     <div style="padding:o 0 0 0;position: relative;">
      <div class="fluid-width-video-wrapper" style="padding:56.25% 0 0 0;position: relative;">
       <iframe allow="autoplay; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" frameborder="0" src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/893674149?badge=0&muted=1&autoplay=1&loop=1&autopause=0&player_id=0&app_id=58479" style="position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;" title="40th anniversary video">
       </iframe>
      </div>
     </div>
     <script src="https://player.vimeo.com/api/player.js">
     </script>
    </div>
   </section>
   <section class="section primary">
    <div class="cta">
     <div class="container small">
      <h2 class="section-header-title cta-title">
       40 years of impact
      </h2>
      <div class="cta-summary">
       <p>
        In honour of our 40th anniversary, we sat down with some of our most extraordinary alumni to hear about the impact they've had since their Chevening year. From foregrounding the human dimensions of climate change to helping women and girls to find their voice, their stories are an inspiring reminder that there is no limit to what you can achieve with a Chevening Scholarship or Fellowship.
       </p>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </section>
   <div class="media-blocks section--nogap">
    <!-- media block -->
    <section class="section section--nogap">
     <div class="columns media-block">
      <figure class="media-block-image">
       <img ""="" alt="" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/VPS_0395-1-scaled-e1697618479893.jpg"/>
      </figure>
      <div class="media-block-content">
       <div class="media-block-inner">
        <span class="media-block-tagline">
        </span>
        <h2 class="media-block-title">
         <a href="/news/climate-warrior">
          Introducing the climate warrior: Anote Tong's journey
         </a>
        </h2>
        <p class="media-block-excerpt">
         In September 2004, President Anote Tong of Kiribati made history at the United Nations General Assembly by highlighting the urgent need for action on climate change, sparking a global movement for climate justice and earning him the title of 'climate warrior.'
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </section>
    <!-- media block -->
    <section class="section section--nogap">
     <div class="columns media-block">
      <figure class="media-block-image">
       <img ""="" alt="" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/MBrajovic_photo.jpg"/>
      </figure>
      <div class="media-block-content">
       <div class="media-block-inner">
        <span class="media-block-tagline">
        </span>
        <h2 class="media-block-title">
         <a href="/news/40-years-of-impact-leaving-conflict-and-finding-community-with-chevening-in-the-1990s">
          Leaving conflict and finding community with Chevening in the 1990s
         </a>
        </h2>
        <p class="media-block-excerpt">
         Dr Mina Brajovic is the Head of the World Health Organisation (WHO) Country Office in Montenegro. She became a Chevening Scholar in 1999, studying Law at the University of Cambridge at a time when her country was recovering from conflict. Almost 25 years on, Mina reflects on how her aspirations for building a better world have changed over time, as well as the key learnings that have stayed with her from her Chevening year.
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </section>
    <!-- media block -->
    <section class="section section--nogap">
     <div class="columns media-block">
      <figure class="media-block-image">
       <img ""="" alt="" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/Kanta-Singh-option-3-scaled.jpg"/>
      </figure>
      <div class="media-block-content">
       <div class="media-block-inner">
        <span class="media-block-tagline">
        </span>
        <h2 class="media-block-title">
         <a href="/news/building-a-better-future-for-women-and-girls-in-india">
          Building a better future for women and girls in India
         </a>
        </h2>
        <p class="media-block-excerpt">
         Kanta Singh has dedicated her whole career to tackling issues of gender inequality. In 2019, she embarked on the Chevening Gurukul Fellowship for Leadership and Excellence. The programme allowed her to expand her network and capacity even further to help her on her mission to build a more equal India, one girl and one voice at a time.
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </section>
   </div>

   <section class="section primary bg-timeline">
    <div class="cta">
     <div class="container small">
      <h2 class="section-header-title cta-title">
       Through the decades
      </h2>
      <div class="cta-summary">
       <p>
        In the early 1980s, a new scholarship programme emerged to provide talented international students with the opportunity to further their education in the UK. This programme, which was announced by the Foreign Secretary Francis Pym in 1983, would become known as Chevening. Initially, the programme was funded for just three years, but 40 years later, its legacy continues.
       </p>
      </div>
      <a aria-label="Timeline" class="button-alt" href="https://www.chevening.org/about/timeline/" target="_self">
       Explore our history
      </a>
     </div>
    </div>
   </section>

        A lot has changed over the past 40 years, but at the heart of it all, Chevening’s commitment to provide exceptional individuals with the opportunity to reach their career goals and make a positive impact has remained the same.             var menu = document.querySelector("#rnav-open");

            var enterKeyCode = 13;
            var spaceKeyCode = 32;

            menuToggle.addEventListener("keyup", function(event) {
                if(event.keyCode == enterKeyCode || event.keyCode == spaceKeyCode) {
                    var menuOpen = menu.checked;

                    if(menuOpen) {
                        menu.checked = false;
                    } else {
                        menu.checked = true;
                    }
                }
            });

           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}
           </style>

           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}

            var enterKeyCode = 13;
            var spaceKeyCode = 32;

            menuToggle.addEventListener("keyup", function(event) {
                if(event.keyCode == enterKeyCode || event.keyCode == spaceKeyCode) {
                    var menuOpen = menu.checked;

                    if(menuOpen) {
                        menu.checked = false;
                    } else {
                        menu.checked = true;
                    }
                }

           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}

   var menuToggle = document.querySelector("#rnav-button");
            var menu = document.querySelector("#rnav-open");

            var enterKeyCode = 13;
            var spaceKeyCode = 32;

            menuToggle.addEventListener("keyup", function(event) {
                if(event.keyCode == enterKeyCode || event.keyCode == spaceKeyCode) {
                    var menuOpen = menu.checked;

           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}

           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}
           </style>

  <main class="main clearfix" id="main">
   <div class="pagehero">
    <img alt="" class="pagehero-image" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/AG-Chevening-Scholars-Durham-085-scaled.jpg"/>
    <div class="pagehero-head">
     <div class="container">
      <div class="pagehero-head-inner">
       <h1 class="pagehero-title">
        About Chevening
       </h1>
       <p class="pagehero-summary">
        Chevening offers fully funded scholarships and fellowships to individuals with ideas to create positive change.
       </p>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="landing-content">
    <div class="container">
     <div class="landing-content__aside">
      <div class="sidebar aaa">
       <div class="sidebar-block">
        <h2 class="sidebar-title" id="sidebar-title-nav">
         In this section
        </h2>
        <nav aria-labelledby="sidebar-title-nav" class="sidebar-nav">
         <ul class="sidebar-nav-list sidebar-ancestor-1768" id="menu-secondary-navigation-4">
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-244 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/about/privacy-notice/">
            Privacy notice
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-9601 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/about/timeline/">
            Timeline
           </a>
          </li>
          <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-1780 sidebar-nav-item">
           <a class="sidebar-nav-item-link" href="https://www.chevening.org/about/contact-us/">
            Contact us
           </a>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </nav>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="landing-content-inner content">
       <p>
        Chevening is the UK government’s international scholarships and fellowships programme.
       </p>
       <p>
        <strong>
         We’ll nurture your ideas and give you the education, network, and confidence to bring those ideas to fruition.
        </strong>
       </p>
       <p>
        Funded by the Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO) and partner organisations, we offer individuals who show potential to inspire, inform, and influence positive change the opportunity to study at a UK university to gain a UK educational qualification.
       </p>
       <p>
        Chevening Scholars
        <a href="https://www.chevening.org/news/university-applications-four-key-points-to-help-you-apply/">
         study subjects in a diverse range of fields
        </a>
        , and go on to implement their ideas for positive change in
        <a href="https://www.chevening.org/alumni/meet-our-cheveners/">
         a range of sectors
        </a>
        .
       </p>
       <p>
        <a href="https://www.chevening.org/fellowships/">
         Chevening Fellowships
        </a>
        offer mid-senior level professionals the opportunity to undertake specialised short courses or research placements at UK universities and institutions.
       </p>
       <p>
        After completing their period of study in the UK, scholars and fellows return home and join our global network of over 60,000 alumni.
       </p>
       <p>
        Chevening is more than just a year spent in the UK, it’s a global community for life.
        <a href="https://www.chevening.org/scholarships/why-study-in-the-uk/">
         Find out more about the benefits of Chevening
        </a>
        .
       </p>
       <hr/>
       <p>
        <img alt="" class="alignnone wp-image-2106 size-full" decoding="async" height="598" loading="lazy" sizes="(max-width: 1000px) 100vw, 1000px" src="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/Chevening-Farewell-1.jpg" srcset="https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/Chevening-Farewell-1.jpg 1000w, https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/Chevening-Farewell-1-300x179.jpg 300w, https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/Chevening-Farewell-1-768x459.jpg 768w, https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/Chevening-Farewell-1-67x40.jpg 67w, https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/Chevening-Farewell-1-502x300.jpg 502w, https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/Chevening-Farewell-1-435x260.jpg 435w, https://www.chevening.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/Chevening-Farewell-1-719x430.jpg 719w" width="1000"/>
       </p>

   <div class="landing-content">
    <div class="container">
     <div class="landing-content__noaside">
      <div class="landing-content-inner content">
       <div class="noside">
        <h3>
         <strong>
          Chevening’s objectives
         </strong>
        </h3>
        <p>
         The mission of the Chevening programme is to support UK foreign policy priorities and achieve FCDO objectives by creating lasting positive relationships with future leaders, influencers, and decision-makers.
        </p>
        <p>
         Chevening grants awards to individuals with outstanding leadership and influencing skills from around the world, to enable them to experience a period of study in the UK. The programme supports awardees from more than 160 countries and territories with the main exceptions being the USA (whose citizens can apply for FCDO-funded Marshall Scholarships) and the majority of the European Union.
        </p>
        <p>
         The Chevening programme began in 1983 and has developed into a prestigious and highly competitive international awards programme. Its success has led to an increased level of investment, with over 1,500 awards made most years.
        </p>
        <hr/>
        <h3>
         <strong>
          The UK Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office
         </strong>
        </h3>
        <p>
         The UK Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office has a worldwide network of embassies and consulates, employing over 14,000 people in nearly 270 diplomatic offices. It works with international organisations to promote British interests and global security, including the EU, NATO, the United Nations, the UN Security Council, and the Commonwealth.
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>

                    $('#ccc input[type="checkbox"]').on('click', function() {

                        var getCategoryText = $(this).parent().parent().parent().find('h3').text();

                        if ($(this).is(':checked')) {
                            $(this).attr('aria-checked', 'true');
                            $(this).parent().attr('aria-label', getCategoryText + ' are on');
                        } else {
                            $(this).attr('aria-checked', 'false');
                            $(this).parent().attr('aria-label', getCategoryText + ' are off');
                        }
                    });
                }

           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}

       <p>
        “
        <em>
         I firmly believe in the life changing power of scholarships. Chevening Scholarships offer future global leaders and decision makers the opportunity to learn and nurture their ambition and potential. Partnerships play a key role by boosting the number of awards we can offer to scholars and bring tangible benefits to those investing by connecting partners with future leaders in their area of expertise and by building closer links with the global FCDO network.” –
        </em>
        <strong>
         <em>
          The Rt Hon David Lammy MP: Secretary of State for Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Affairs
         </em>
        </strong>
       </p>

           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}

        <div class="feed-item-summary">
         <p>

         </p>

           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}
           </style>

           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}

       <p class="pagehero-summary">
        In September 2004, President Anote Tong of Kiribati made history at the United Nations General Assembly by highlighting the urgent need for action on climate change, sparking a global movement for climate justice and earning him the title of 'climate warrior.'

    <div class="landing-content">
     <div class="container">
      <div class="landing-content-inner content">
       <p>
        Imagine being the first leader to stand before the world at a UN General Assembly and declare the catastrophic impact of climate change for people living in countries on the frontline. That’s exactly what Anote Tong, President of Kiribati and Chevening Alumnus, did at the 2004 UN General Assembly.
       </p>
       <p>
        His words echoed with urgency: “
        <em>
         Our very existence as a state is at stake.”
        </em>
       </p>
       <p>
        Tong’s journey began with a profound realisation – the world was not paying attention to the human toll of climate change. Feeling isolated in his concerns, he questioned why others weren’t speaking up. But Tong’s persistence paid off. By 2007, his message had reverberated across the Pacific, and climate change was a global priority.
       </p>
       <p>
        <em>
         “For a long time, climate change was just discussed out of scientific curiosity, but not many people associated it with the threat to human lives, and what it means – not just for polar bears – but for people like us, who will lose our homes because of climate change.”
        </em>
       </p>
       <p>
        Tong didn’t stop there. He took action to protect his people, purchasing land in Fiji as a refuge against rising sea levels. His visionary approach earned him the title of “climate warrior.”
       </p>
       <p>
        Reflecting on his journey, Tong credits his Chevening experience for empowering him to navigate the international stage. The programme instilled in him the confidence, values, and perspective needed to effect change.
       </p>
       <p>
        <em>
         “My Chevening experience became a part of me. It gave me that confidence that I needed to interact at the international level I believe that Chevening also helped give me the standards, the values, and the principles that I applied later in life [during my political career]. Often it’s not the classroom where you learn the best lessons, but rather the people who you get to interact with.”
        </em>
       </p>
       <p>
        For Tong, politics is more than just a career – it’s a calling to serve others. He urges current Chevening Scholars to use their influence for good and consider the power of politics in shaping a better world.
       </p>
       <p>
        Anote Tong’s story is a testament to the impact of leadership, perseverance, and the belief that one person can change the world. As he once said, “Politics needs good people.” And if you’re a Chevening Scholar, you’re already one of them.
       </p>
       <p>
        <em>
         ‘The fact that you are a Chevening Scholar means you have already shown that you have the capacity to influence decision making in whatever field you might be in. So make maximum use of that. And of course understand that if you’ve been selected for such a scholarship, you have been given a gift, so you must use that talent for the purpose of serving not just yourself, but others too.”
        </em>
       </p>
      </div>
     </div>

			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}

       <p class="pagehero-summary">
        Dr Mina Brajovic is the Head of the World Health Organisation (WHO) Country Office in Montenegro. She became a Chevening Scholar in 1999, studying Law at the University of Cambridge at a time when her country was recovering from conflict. Almost 25 years on, Mina reflects on how her aspirations for building a better world have changed over time, as well as the key learnings that have stayed with her from her Chevening year.
       </p>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="landing">
    <div class="landing-content">
     <div class="container">
      <div class="landing-content-inner content">
       <p>
        ‘Many things have changed since I applied to Chevening on a national, regional, global, and personal level – but one thing hasn’t changed, and that is my passion for fairness and contributing to a world where no one will be left behind.’
       </p>
       <p>
        Mina’s drive to apply for a Chevening Scholarship was fuelled in large part by this passion. Even as a child, she says that she was acutely aware of any signs of unfairness or injustice that surrounded her.
       </p>
       <p>
        ‘When I was applying for the scholarship, my hope was that I would develop my competencies, my skills, and my knowledge to help my country to build a more just and prosperous society. I wanted to advocate for the rights of those who were vulnerable.’
       </p>
       <p>
        At the time when Mina was applying for Chevening in the late 1990s, her country of Montenegro (then the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia) was still recovering from years of conflict, isolationism, and sanctions.
       </p>
       <blockquote>
        <p>
         ‘Those were exceptionally difficult years. To come from that context and end up in the UK, where everything seemed to be set up for students like me, where everyone was supportive and happy to help – it was an extreme culture shock for me. That experience marked my whole life.’
        </p>
       </blockquote>
       <p>
        Mina had been right about Chevening helping her to build up her competencies. She says the knowledge she acquired in that one year, learning together with and from some of the brightest minds in the world at the University of Cambridge, was ‘immense’. It was a sort of ‘voyage of discovery’, which helped her to look at the world with new eyes and develop a different attitude to acquiring knowledge.
       </p>
       <p>
        ‘Back at home we were taught one view on the subjects we studied. But at Cambridge, I was suddenly confronted with three or four different opinions on the same subject. I remember my consultations with Professor James R Crawford, one of the most eminent “masters” of public international law, and how he was focused on teaching us
        <em>
         how
        </em>
        to think, not
        <em>
         what
        </em>
        to think. It helped me realise that it was not a matter of right or wrong, it’s about thinking creatively outside of the box and searching for the truth. It’s about building up sound arguments based on the evidence you find, and then presenting those arguments, while respecting different opinions.’
       </p>
       <p>
        Beyond the more practical skills and knowledge that Mina learned at Cambridge, she says that one of the most critical learnings she carried with her from that year was the importance of empathy and community.
       </p>
       <blockquote>
        <p>
         ‘Whenever I felt nostalgic about home during my Chevening year, I was amazed by the kindness, support, and the capacity to listen and care that I found at Cambridge. It showed me that if we really want to see this society flourish and prosper, we need to care about each other and support each other.
        </p>
        <p>
        </p>
        <p>
         I didn’t feel like a foreigner in the UK, I felt I was part of a community. I felt at home. I was respected, supported, and welcomed. It meant that my Chevening year was not only one year spent with the best students and best professors from across the world, it was a year of finding lifelong friendships and a family for life.’
        </p>
       </blockquote>
       <p>
        When Mina returned home after her Chevening year, she says she had experienced such a boost in her confidence that she was able to navigate the ongoing challenges that remained in her home country. The pace of her career growth also quickened. She was offered a job with a US consulting company, running the World Bank Health Sector Reform Project, and eventually landed her job at the World Health Organisation (WHO).
       </p>
       <p>
        ‘For many people [who knew me], joining WHO seemed like a sharp change from working in law. But these worlds share common goals. Just as a lawyer advocates for the rights of others, WHO helps people to exercise the most fundamental of human rights: the right to health. I believe that no one should be left behind in our societies, and I continue to be motivated to serve the world’s most vulnerable.’
       </p>
       <p>
        Staying true to her childhood ambition to build a more fair and just society, Mina sees the issue of translating the theoretical concept of universal health coverage into practice as the greatest challenge of our time.
       </p>
       <p>
        ‘We live in an epoch of globalised economy and society. We witness deepening inequalities, unprecedented climate change and environmental degradation, growing insecurity, and a sense of hopelessness, even among the young who often face a more uncertain future than that of their parents.  These challenges are a risk to humankind. We require new and global solutions, and we require strong leadership to make the transition to a more sustainable, safer, and healthier future for all – just as the UN 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development calls for.’
       </p>
       <p>
        What gives Mina hope that we can still make progress in these areas?
       </p>
       <blockquote>
        <p>
         ‘Collaboration, partnership, and dialogue. There are many things happening in today’s world that can kill this sense of hope, especially when one examines the breakdown of trust in institutions – including health institutions. But it is only together, as a humanity, that we can tackle these challenges.
        </p>
        <p>
        </p>
        <p>
         Only if we nurture knowledge and only if we support young people to strengthen their skills and their competencies can we really hope to manage the very complex challenges that our society is faced with.
        </p>
        <p>
        </p>
        <p>
         So, my message to the next generation of Chevening Scholars is to be passionate about investing in knowledge and excellence. The world needs visionary and knowledgeable people to help realise economic, social, and environmental goals for the benefit of all. And knowledge is a resource that grows when shared. Only with knowledge, and a sense of responsibility, will you help your community to thrive and become resilient. And only in strong communities do resilient citizens live, who lead healthy, happy, and prosperous lives.’
        </p>
       </blockquote>
       <p>
        <em>
         Dr Mina Brajovic holds a Master in Law, European Affairs from the University of Cambridge and a PhD in Medicine from the University of Ljubljana.
        </em>
       </p>
      </div>
     </div>

            var enterKeyCode = 13;
            var spaceKeyCode = 32;

            menuToggle.addEventListener("keyup", function(event) {
                if(event.keyCode == enterKeyCode || event.keyCode == spaceKeyCode) {
                    var menuOpen = menu.checked;

                    if(menuOpen) {
                        menu.checked = false;
                    } else {
                        menu.checked = true;
                    }
                }

                        $(this).attr('role', 'switch');
                        if ($(this).is(':checked')) {
                            $(this).parent().attr('aria-label', getCategoryText + ' are on');
                            $(this).attr('aria-checked', 'true');
                        } else {

                             $(this).attr('aria-checked', 'false');

                            $(this).attr('aria-checked', 'false');
                            $(this).parent().attr('aria-label', getCategoryText + ' are off');
                        }
                    });
                }

           <style>
            /* If there is a fixed header */
			.header {
				position: relative;
				top: auto;
			}
			.main {
				padding: 0;
			}

			/* Alert banner styling */
			.alert-banner {
				display: none;
				background-color: #003F72;
				color: #FFFFFF;
				left: 0;
				margin-top: 0;
				padding: 2rem 1rem 0.8rem;
				position: relative;
				text-align: center;
				top: 0;
				width: 100%;
			}
			.alert-banner * {
				margin-top: 0;
			}
			.alert-banner.lightblue {
				background-color: #84A2BD;
			}
			.alert-banner.red {
				background-color: #DC0A2C;
			}
			.alert-banner.gray {
				background-color: #D0D2CF;
				color: #000000;
			}

			.alert-banner h3 {
				font-size: 1.2em;
				padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
			}
			.alert-banner p {
				margin: 0 auto;
				padding: 0;
				width: 90%;
			}
			.alert-banner p a {
				font-weight: bold;
				text-decoration: underline;
			}
			.close-icon {
				border: solid 2px #FFFFFF;
				color: #FFF;
				border-radius: 100%;
				display: block;
				font-family: sans-serif;
				font-weight: normal;
				font-size: 17px;
				height: 30px;
				margin: 1rem auto;
				text-align: center;
				width: 30px;
				line-height: 28px;
			}

			@media screen and (min-width: 960px) {
				.alert-banner {
					padding: 0.8rem 1rem;
				}
				.alert-banner p {
					padding: 0 2.5rem;
					width: 70%;
				}
				.close-icon {
					margin: 0;
					position: absolute;
					right: 2rem;
					top: 50%;
					transform: translate(0, -50%);
				}
			}
